name: Spirit Way
description:
All buildings can create previously achieved dynasty units. Houses technologies to upgrade dynasty units which can be researched for -50% cost and  50% of research time 
When a dynasty unit dies, all nearby units will receive +20% attack speed and +20 health over 10 seconds
